attributes.action: Anyone who attacks our country's armed forces by word or deed should be tried for treason
attributes.additional_details: The enemies of our country who live within our shores and speak out or attack our armed force personnel should be tried for treason. This still carries the death penalty. As the armed forces are representative of our Queen they are also attacking her. Those convicted should face the ultimate punishment.  The Government must protect the men who protect us. The British people deserve better protection. Why should people who hate us be allowed freedom of speech.
